params.name: input_ids
params.description: Indices of input sequence tokens in the vocabulary. Indices can be obtained using AutoTokenizer. SeePreTrainedTokenizer.encode() and PreTrainedTokenizer.call() for details. What are inputIDs?

params.name: attention_mask
params.description: Mask to avoid performing attention on padding token indices. Mask values selected in [0, 1]:1 for tokens that are not masked,0 for tokens that are masked.What are attention masks?

params.name: output_attentions
params.description: Whether or not to return the attentions tensors of all attention layers. See attentions under returnedtensors for more detail.

params.name: output_hidden_states
params.description: Whether or not to return the hidden states of all layers. See hidden_states under returned tensors formore detail.

params.name: return_dict
params.description: Whether or not to return a ModelOutput instead of a plain tuple.
